world.name: Realm of the Crystal Spire
world.description: A mystical land where a mysterious crystal spire dominates the skyline, its presence affecting magic throughout the realm.

locations.Northaven Village: A peaceful trading village nestled in the shadow of the Crystal Spire
locations.Mystic Forest: An ancient woodland where magical creatures dwell
locations.Crystal Spire Base: The mysterious foundation of the towering crystal structure
locations.Dwarven Mines: Rich mineral deposits worked by skilled dwarven miners

quests.crystal-resonance: Investigate the unusual magical resonance emanating from the Crystal Spire
quests.missing-merchant: Find the missing merchant who disappeared on the road to Northaven
quests.dwarven-artifact: Recover an ancient dwarven artifact from the mines

7b8e8000-c2a1-4c61-b556-447755550001.name: Northaven Village
7b8e8000-c2a1-4c61-b556-447755550001.description: The main village of the region

grid.name: Village Square
grid.description: The central gathering place of Northaven

7b8e8000-c2a1-4c61-b556-447755550002.name: Village Well
7b8e8000-c2a1-4c61-b556-447755550002.description: A stone well in the village square. The water here is clean and refreshing.

availableActions.name: Drink
availableActions.description: You drink from the well. The water is cool and refreshing.

7b8e8000-c2a1-4c61-b556-447755550003.name: Barley Goldfoam
7b8e8000-c2a1-4c61-b556-447755550003.description: A portly man with a bushy mustache and a jolly demeanor.

dialogs.text: Welcome to the Golden Barrel! What can I get you?

options.text: Tell me about the Crystal Spire

7b8e8000-c2a1-4c61-b556-447755550005.name: The Golden Barrel Tavern
7b8e8000-c2a1-4c61-b556-447755550005.description: A cozy tavern with a warm hearth and the smell of fresh bread
